ICT.text: The internet is a wide area network
HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.
RAM stands for Read Access Memory.
HTTP is the protocol used for transferring web pages.

Maths.text: The sum of angles in a triangle is 180 degrees.
The product of any number and 0 is 0.
A rectangle has four sides of equal length.

English.text: A noun is a person, place, or thing.
A sentence must have a subject and a verb.

Science.text: The chemical symbol for gold is Au.
Earth is the third planet from the Sun.
Photosynthesis occurs in the roots of plants.

General Knowledge.text: The capital of France is Paris.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space.
The first man to walk on the moon was Neil Armstrong.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.
The Pacific Ocean is the smallest ocean on Earth.
